content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Max Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content:
Hello Max, I'm glad you're interested in my apartment. I'm thinking of renting it out for 900 euros per month.

If you agree to this price, please let me know and we can finalize the agreement. If not, I'm open to hearing your offer.

Keep in mind that I'm looking for the highest possible price, so I hope you understand if I'm not willing to negotiate too much.

Let me know your thoughts.

Best regards,
Peter Schmidt
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content:
I don't want to continue the negotiation, because 900 Euro is too expensive for me. I can't afford this price. TERMINATE.
User 0: I understand, Max. I can see how the price might be a bit steep for you. I'm sorry I couldn't accommodate your budget.

Good luck with your apartment search!

Best regards,
Peter Schmidt
name: Max Müller from Germany
